languages.text: For 1 round, the Arbitrator and their allies gain immunity to the {g|f:8de915da52f24d9bb925d13fb2c8cf98}prone{/g}, {g|f:f1c0c6bee3c54cc694c1d1746eafcb15}stunned{/g}, {g|f:4f13e446713f440bbc30e8d216bc9f1e}immobilised{/g}, and {g|f:4755bff66f544cf7bd9f5be37dad08db}cannot attack{/g} effects, as well as to all types of forced movement. Enemies must pass a Willpower resistance test with a penalty of -{uip|Damage|376ff1a6c0274b4e9564935e1ae9a383} or become {g|f:4f13e446713f440bbc30e8d216bc9f1e}immobilised{/g} until the Arbitrator's next turn.

traits.locale_text: For 1 round, the Arbitrator and their allies gain immunity to the {g|f:8de915da52f24d9bb925d13fb2c8cf98}prone{/g}, {g|f:f1c0c6bee3c54cc694c1d1746eafcb15}stunned{/g}, {g|f:4f13e446713f440bbc30e8d216bc9f1e}immobilised{/g}, and {g|f:4755bff66f544cf7bd9f5be37dad08db}cannot attack{/g} effects, as well as to all types of forced movement. Enemies must pass a Willpower resistance test with a penalty of -{uip|Damage|376ff1a6c0274b4e9564935e1ae9a383} or become {g|f:4f13e446713f440bbc30e8d216bc9f1e}immobilised{/g} until the Arbitrator's next turn.

languages.text: For 1 round, the Arbitrator and their allies gain immunity to the {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} effects, as well as to all types of forced movement. Enemies must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Damage|376ff1a6c0274b4e9564935e1ae9a383} penalty or become immobilised until the Arbitrator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
languages.original_text: На 1 раунд арбитр и его союзники получают иммунитет к {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокидыванию{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушению{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиживанию{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}неспособности атаковать{/g}, а также ко всем типам принудительного перемещения. Противники совершают проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|Damage|376ff1a6c0274b4e9564935e1ae9a383} и в случае провала оказываются обездвиженными до начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} арбитра.

traits.locale_text: For 1 round, the Arbitrator and their allies gain immunity to the prone, stunned, immobilised, and cannot attack effects, as well as to all types of forced movement. Enemies must pass a Willpower resistance test with a −{uip|Damage|376ff1a6c0274b4e9564935e1ae9a383} penalty or become {g|f:4f13e446713f440bbc30e8d216bc9f1e}immobilised{/g} until the Arbitrator's next turn.

For 1 round, the Arbitrator and their allies gain immunity to the prone, stunned, immobilised, and cannot attack effects, as well as to all types of forced movement. Enemies must pass a Willpower resistance test with a −{uip|Damage|376ff1a6c0274b4e9564935e1ae9a383} penalty or become immobilised until the Arbitrator's next turn.

Enemies must pass a Willpower resistance test with a penalty of -{uip|Damage|376ff1a6c0274b4e9564935e1ae9a383} or become {g|f:4f13e446713f440bbc30e8d216bc9f1e}immobilised{/g} until the Arbitrator's next turn.

languages.text: Yargıcı ve dost birimleri {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilme{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemlik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}saldıramama{/g} etkilerinin yanı sıra her türlü zorunlu hareket türüne karşı 1 rauntluğuna bağışıklık kazanır. Düşmanlar, −{uip|Damage|376ff1a6c0274b4e9564935e1ae9a383} ceza puanına sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde felç olurlar. Bu felç etkisi Yargıcı'nın bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turuna{/g} dek sürer.
languages.original_text: For 1 round, the Arbitrator and their allies gain immunity to the {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} effects, as well as to all types of forced movement. Enemies must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Damage|376ff1a6c0274b4e9564935e1ae9a383} penalty or become immobilised until the Arbitrator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Yargıcı ve dost birimleri yere devrilme, sersemlik, felç ve saldıramama etkilerinin yanı sıra her türlü zorunlu hareket türüne karşı 1 rauntluğuna bağışıklık kazanır. Düşmanlar, −{uip|Damage|376ff1a6c0274b4e9564935e1ae9a383} ceza puanına sahip bir İrade direnç testinden geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde felç olurlar. Bu felç etkisi Yargıcı'nın bir sonraki turuna dek sürer.

Yargıcı ve dost birimleri yere devrilme, sersemlik, felç ve saldıramama etkilerinin yanı sıra her türlü zorunlu hareket türüne karşı 1 rauntluğuna bağışıklık kazanır. Düşmanlar, −{uip|Damage|376ff1a6c0274b4e9564935e1ae9a383} ceza puanına sahip bir İrade direnç testinden geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde felç olurlar. Bu felç etkisi Yargıcı'nın bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turuna{/g} dek sürer.

languages.text: Durante 1 asalto, el Arbitrator y sus aliados se vuelven inmunes a los efectos de {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}no puede atacar{/g}, así como a todos los tipos de movimiento forzado. Sus enemigos deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una penalización de −{uip|Damage|376ff1a6c0274b4e9564935e1ae9a383} o quedarán inmovilizados hasta el próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del Arbitrator.
languages.original_text: For 1 round, the Arbitrator and their allies gain immunity to the {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} effects, as well as to all types of forced movement. Enemies must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Damage|376ff1a6c0274b4e9564935e1ae9a383} penalty or become immobilised until the Arbitrator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Durante 1 asalto, el Arbitrator y sus aliados se vuelven inmunes a los efectos de derribado, aturdido, inmovilizado y no puede atacar, así como a todos los tipos de movimiento forzado. Sus enemigos deben superar una prueba de fortaleza de Voluntad con una penalización de −{uip|Damage|376ff1a6c0274b4e9564935e1ae9a383} o quedarán inmovilizados hasta el próximo turno del Arbitrator.

Durante 1 asalto, el Arbitrator y sus aliados se vuelven inmunes a los efectos de derribado, aturdido, inmovilizado y no puede atacar, así como a todos los tipos de movimiento forzado. Sus enemigos deben superar una prueba de fortaleza de Voluntad con una penalización de −{uip|Damage|376ff1a6c0274b4e9564935e1ae9a383} o quedarán inmovilizados hasta el próximo turno del Arbitrator.

languages.text: 在一轮内，法务官与所有盟友免疫{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}无法攻击{/g}，以及一切强制位移效果。所有敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-{uip|Damage|376ff1a6c0274b4e9564935e1ae9a383}减值，若未能通过检定，则会陷入定身状态，效果持续至法务官的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。
languages.original_text: For 1 round, the Arbitrator and their allies gain immunity to the {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} effects, as well as to all types of forced movement. Enemies must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Damage|376ff1a6c0274b4e9564935e1ae9a383} penalty or become immobilised until the Arbitrator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 在一轮内，法务官与所有盟友免疫倒地、眩晕、定身、无法攻击，以及一切强制位移效果。所有敌人需要进行意志抗性检定，且在此次检定中承受-{uip|Damage|376ff1a6c0274b4e9564935e1ae9a383}减值，若未能通过检定，则会陷入定身状态，效果持续至法务官的下个回合开始。
在一轮内，法务官与所有盟友免疫倒地、眩晕、定身、无法攻击，以及一切强制位移效果。所有敌人需要进行意志抗性检定，且在此次检定中承受-{uip|Damage|376ff1a6c0274b4e9564935e1ae9a383}减值，若未能通过检定，则会陷入定身状态，效果持续至法务官的下个回合开始。

languages.text: Pendant 1 round, l'arbitrator et ses alliés bénéficient d'une immunité contre les effets {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}Attaque impossible{/g}, ainsi que contre tous les types de déplacements forcés. Les ennemis doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} avec une pénalité de −{uip|Damage|376ff1a6c0274b4e9564935e1ae9a383}, sans quoi ils sont immobilisés jusqu'au prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de l'arbitrator.
languages.original_text: For 1 round, the Arbitrator and their allies gain immunity to the {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} effects, as well as to all types of forced movement. Enemies must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Damage|376ff1a6c0274b4e9564935e1ae9a383} penalty or become immobilised until the Arbitrator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Pendant 1 round, l'arbitrator et ses alliés bénéficient d'une immunité contre les effets Paralysie, Étourdissement, Immobilisation et Attaque impossible, ainsi que contre tous les types de déplacements forcés. Les ennemis doivent réussir un test de résistance de Force mentale avec une pénalité de −{uip|Damage|376ff1a6c0274b4e9564935e1ae9a383}, sans quoi ils sont immobilisés jusqu'au prochain tour de l'arbitrator.

Pendant 1 round, l'arbitrator et ses alliés bénéficient d'une immunité contre les effets Paralysie, Étourdissement, Immobilisation et Attaque impossible, ainsi que contre tous les types de déplacements forcés. Les ennemis doivent réussir un test de résistance de Force mentale avec une pénalité de −{uip|Damage|376ff1a6c0274b4e9564935e1ae9a383}, sans quoi ils sont immobilisés jusqu'au prochain tour de l'arbitrator.

Pendant 1 round, l'arbitrator et ses alliés bénéficient d'une immunité contre les effets Paralysie, Étourdissement, Immobilisation et Attaque impossible, ainsi que contre tous les types de déplacements forcés. Les ennemis doivent réussir un test de résistance de Force mentale avec une pénalité de −{uip|Damage|376ff1a6c0274b4e9564935e1ae9a383}, sans quoi ils sont immobilisés jusqu'au prochain tour de l'arbitrator.

languages.text: 1ラウンドの間、アービトレイターとその味方は、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}スタン{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}攻撃不可{/g}に対する耐性を獲得し、強制移動効果を受けなくなる。敵は、-{uip|Damage|376ff1a6c0274b4e9564935e1ae9a383}のペナルティで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならず、失敗するとアービトレイターの次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで移動不可になる。
languages.original_text: For 1 round, the Arbitrator and their allies gain immunity to the {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} effects, as well as to all types of forced movement. Enemies must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Damage|376ff1a6c0274b4e9564935e1ae9a383} penalty or become immobilised until the Arbitrator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 1ラウンドの間、アービトレイターとその味方は、脆弱化、スタン、移動不可に対する耐性を獲得し、攻撃効果並びにあらゆる強制移動効果を受けなくなる。敵は、-{uip|Damage|376ff1a6c0274b4e9564935e1ae9a383}のペナルティで意志力抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗するとアービトレイターの次のターンまで移動不可になる。
1ラウンドの間、アービトレイターとその味方は、脆弱化、スタン、移動不可に対する耐性を獲得し、攻撃効果並びにあらゆる強制移動効果を受けなくなる。敵は、-{uip|Damage|376ff1a6c0274b4e9564935e1ae9a383}のペナルティで意志力抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗するとアービトレイターの次のターンまで移動不可になる。

languages.text: Der Arbitrator und seine Verbündeten sind 1 Runde lang immun gegen {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Hingestreckt{/g}-, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Betäubt{/g}-, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Gelähmt{/g}- und {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}Angriffsunfähig{/g}-Effekte sowie gegen alle Arten erzwungener Bewegung. Gegner müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} mit einem Abzug von -{uip|Damage|376ff1a6c0274b4e9564935e1ae9a383} bestehen, um nicht bis zum Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Arbitrators gelähmt zu werden.
languages.original_text: For 1 round, the Arbitrator and their allies gain immunity to the {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} effects, as well as to all types of forced movement. Enemies must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Damage|376ff1a6c0274b4e9564935e1ae9a383} penalty or become immobilised until the Arbitrator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Arbitrator und seine Verbündeten sind 1 Runde lang immun gegen Hingestreckt-, Betäubt-, Gelähmt- und Angriffsunfähig-Effekte sowie gegen alle Arten erzwungener Bewegung. Gegner müssen eine Widerstandsprobe auf Willenskraft mit einem Abzug von -{uip|Damage|376ff1a6c0274b4e9564935e1ae9a383} bestehen, um nicht bis zum Beginn des nächsten Zuges des Arbitrators gelähmt zu werden.

Der Arbitrator und seine Verbündeten sind 1 Runde lang immun gegen Hingestreckt-, Betäubt-, Gelähmt- und Angriffsunfähig-Effekte sowie gegen alle Arten erzwungener Bewegung. Gegner müssen eine Widerstandsprobe auf Willenskraft mit einem Abzug von -{uip|Damage|376ff1a6c0274b4e9564935e1ae9a383} bestehen, um nicht bis zum Beginn des nächsten Zuges des Arbitrators gelähmt zu werden.

traits.locale_text: На 1 раунд арбитр и его союзники получают иммунитет к опрокидыванию, оглушению, обездвиживанию и неспособности атаковать, а также ко всем типам принудительного перемещения. Противники совершают проверку Воли на сопротивление со штрафом −{uip|Damage|376ff1a6c0274b4e9564935e1ae9a383} и в случае провала оказываются обездвиженными до начала следующего хода арбитра.

На 1 раунд арбитр и его союзники получают иммунитет к опрокидыванию, оглушению, обездвиживанию и неспособности атаковать, а также ко всем типам принудительного перемещения. Противники совершают проверку Воли на сопротивление со штрафом −{uip|Damage|376ff1a6c0274b4e9564935e1ae9a383} и в случае провала оказываются обездвиженными до начала следующего хода арбитра.
